recipe: Follow instructions on kodiak cakes box. Add blueberries and syrup to taste.
Follow instructions on waffle mix. Add blueberries and syrup to taste. Enjoy!
Make jambalaya rice. Add in seared red peppers and heated kielbasa, and serve. Enjoy!

Heat 1.82 cups water to 95 degrees F and add the yeast. Whisk together and wait for it to bloom. Mix dry ingredients using a whisk. Once the yeast is blooming, combine it with the dry ingredients, and add the oil.
Mix dough until shaggy. Rest dough for 15-20 minutes and then knead using the fold and plop method. Repeat the rest and knead cycle once more.
Oil dough ball and a bowl, cover, and rest dough for 4-6 hours in a warm space. (Alternatively, you may keep this in the fridge for 14-16 hours). Punch down the dough and spread on oiled 11X22in cookie sheet with walls. Proof for 2 hours covered and wrapped.
Preheat oven to 500 degrees F. Add sauce, cheese, and toppings, going all the way up to the edges of the dough. Cook 20-25 minutes or until the cheese is carmelized a deep brown.
Combine all ingredients in a slow cooker. Drain the liquid from the red benas, but keep the liquid from all other cans. Cook on low for 4-6 hours, or high for 2-3 hours. Enjoy!
Combine all ingredients in a slow cooker. Drain the liquid from the red benas, but keep the liquid from all other cans. Cook on low for 4-6 hours, or high for 2-3 hours. Enjoy!

meal_name: Crock Pot Cordon Bleu with side of potatoes
recipe:
1. Place chicken pieces between 2 pieces of wax paper and pound until slightly flattened. Place 1-2 slices ham and 1 slice swiss on each breast and roll up. Secure with toothpicks and roll in flour.

 2. Put muchrooms in the slow cooker and place chicken rolls on top of mushrooms. In a separate bowl, mix 1/4 cup chicken stock, cup white wine or vinegat/water substite, and rosemary together and pour over chicken. Sprinkle with parmesan.

 3.Set cooker on low heat and cook for 4 hours, or until chicken is cooked through.

4.Just before serving, mix cornstarch, water, and Kitchen Bouquet together. Remove chiken, add cornstarch mixture and stir until thickened.

 5.Add salt, pepper, and sugar as desired. Pour sauce over chicken and serve.

Mashed potatoes recommended as side. 

Note: Recipe serves two.

1. Heat oven to 425. Spread one pie crust on bottom of a casserole dish or pie pan.

 2. In a medium saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add onion. cook 2 minutes. Stir in flour, salt, pepper, 1.75 cups chicken broth, and milk. Cook, stirring regularly, until bubbly and thickened.

 3. Stir in chicken and mixed vegetables. Remove from heat. Spoon chicken mixture into crust-lined pan. Top with second crust and seal. Cut slits in several places in the top crust.

 4.Bake 30-40 minutes or until crust is golden brown. During last 15 - 20 minutes, cover crust edge with strips of foil to prevent excessive browning. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. Enjoy!

1. Cook tortellini according to directions listed on package.

 2. Meanwhile, in a large saurcepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic and saute 30 seconds. Add flour and onion powder and cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. While whisking, slowly pour in milk and cream, then whisk until smooth. Cook, stirring, until mixture begins to simmer.

3. Then add tomatoes, spinach, basil, and organo. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Cook several minutes longer until sauce has thickened and spinach has wilted. Add parmesan cheese and stir until melted.

4. Add drained tortellini and serve. Enjoy!

meal_name: costco rotisserie chicken and brussels sprouts
recipe: Slice brussels sprouts into halves, cover with olive oil, salt, and pepper, and cook at 450 degrees for about 15 minutes, or until cripsy. Prepare rotisserie chicken to serve while brussels are cooking. Enjoy!
Follow instructions on kodiak cakes box. Add chocolate chips and syrup to taste.
Follow instructions on kodiak cakes box. Add 1 Tbsp cinnamon and 1 tsp vanilla per 1 cup of mix used. Add syrup to taste.
Follow instructions on kodiak cakes box for pancakes. Slice up fresh strawberries, or heat up frozen strawberries, then place them on pancakes as topping.

meal_name: vegan pancakes with strawberries and nutella
recipe: Follow instructions on pancake mix for pancakes. Spread nutella on pancakes. Slice up fresh strawberries, or heat up frozen strawberries, then place them on pancakes as topping.

Cook sausages as large patties. Cook eggs over medium, breaking and spreading the yolk during cooking. While egg is cooking, slice and toast onion bagel. Place 1 slice cheddar cheese on onion bagel. Place cooked egg onto cheese, then sausage on top of egg. Enjoy!

Cook ground breakfast sausage.

Cook shredded hash browns in oil.

Slice up bell pepper and onion. Heat a drizzle of oil in a pan on medium high heat. Add sliced pepper and onion and cook until softened.

With the pepper and onion still in the pan, add 4 eggs and scramble while cooking, incorporating with the vegatables. When the eggs are almost done, add breakfast sausage.

Heat up tortilla in microwave for 15 seconds. Add egg mixture, shredded cheese, and hash browns into tortilla.

Wrap up and secure with toothpicks. Enjoy!

With the pepper and onion still in the pan, add 4 eggs and scramble while cooking, incorporating with the vegatables. When the eggs are almost done, add breakfast sausage.

Wrap up and secure with toothpicks. Enjoy!

Heat olive oil in a skillet on medium high heat. Add sliced bell peppers, onion, and ham (if not vegetarian version) and saute until lightly charred. Put off to side in a bowl. Cook hash brown potatoes in oil. When the potatoes are almost done, cook 4 eggs (2 each skillet) in a separate pan, over easy, and mix onions and peppers back in. Season generously with salt and pepper, finish cooking potato mixture, then transfer to a plate. Immediately top with mexican cheese, and place eggs on top of cheese. Top with sliced green onions.

Cook hash brown potatoes in oil. When the potatoes are almost done, cook 4 eggs (2 each skillet) in a separate pan, over easy, and mix onions and peppers back in. Season generously with salt and pepper, finish cooking potato mixture, then transfer to a plate. Immediately top with mexican cheese, and place eggs on top of cheese. Top with sliced green onions.

Prepare instant mashed potatoes. Top with gravy, corn, and chicken gravy, and 2 chicken tenders each. Enjoy!

link: cook sausage and biscuits. Mix flour and butter in with sausage on medium heat. Slowly add milk about 1 cup at a time and let thicken, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper to taste (about 1/4 tsp salt, 1/8 tsp pepper?).

cook sausage and biscuits. Mix flour and butter in with sausage on medium heat. Slowly add milk about 1 cup at a time and let thicken, stirring occasionally. Add salt and pepper to taste (about 1/4 tsp salt, 1/8 tsp pepper?).

Mix ingredients in blender. Let sit for 30 minutes + in the fridge. Put a thin layer in a pan on medium heat, and flip after about a minute. Top with butter and cinnamon sugar, or other toppings to taste.

recipe: Add milk to rolled oats in a bowl until just covered. Cook in microwave for 2 minutes, or until milk is dissolved. Add fresh fruit and cream. Enjoy!
Slice croissant and heat for 2 minutes on low broil. Spread nutella on croissant. Enjoy!

meal_name: bacon, hash browns, fruit, and eggs
Puff Pastry Chicken and brussels sprouts
recipe: 1. Season chicken with salt and pepper. Melt butter in skillet. Add chicken and cook until browned. /n/n 2.Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Roll out pastry sheet and put 1/4 chicken breast and about 2 tbsp bourskin cheese in the center. Pinch edges shut. /n/n3. Mix 1 egg and 1tsp butter. Place chicken packets seam side up on a baking sheet. Brush with egg wash, top with dried parsley, and bake for about 25 minutes (but check early). Enjoy!
Follow instructions on Mongolian beef seasoning packet.

Serves 2.

1. Cook ground beef in pan, drain fat, and then mix in taco seasoning and water, following instructions on the taco seasoning packet. Transfer cooked taco meat to a bowl 

2. Dice avocado, jalapeno, and roma tomatoes. 

3. Heat additional olive oil in the same pan where you cooked the beef. Place 6 corn tortillas (this can be done in 2 sets as needed). 

4. Spread chipotle mayo, cheese, beef, jalapenos, avocado, and tomatoes on quesadillas. Place another corn tortilla on top. Flip after about 3 minutes, or once down side is crispy. 

5. Optionally serve with greek yogurt as a sour cream replacement. Enjoy!

Serves 2.

1. Cook ground beef in pan, drain fat, and then mix in taco seasoning and water, following instructions on the taco seasoning packet. Transfer cooked taco meat to a bowl 

2. Dice avocado, jalapeno, and roma tomatoes. 

3. Heat additional olive oil in the same pan where you cooked the beef. Place 6 corn tortillas (this can be done in 2 sets as needed). 

4. Spread chipotle mayo, cheese, beef, jalapenos, avocado, and tomatoes on quesadillas. Place another corn tortilla on top. Flip after about 3 minutes, or once down side is crispy. 

5. Optionally serve with greek yogurt as a sour cream replacement. Enjoy!

Serves 2.

Heat oil in a pan. Place 6 corn tortillas (can do 2 sets of 3 as needed). Spread with cheese, avocado, tomato, and jalapeno. Place another corn tortilla on top. Flip after about 3 minutes, or when the bottom side is crispy and browned. Enjoy!

Serves 2. 

Medium boil 2 eggs. Slice lettuce, cucumber, and grape tomatoes. Mix together lettuce, cucumber, tomato, banana peppers, and dressing to taste. Slice egg into slices. Top each salad with feta cheese and 1 sliced egg. Enjoy!

1. Cook the pasta. 2. Slice all the vegetables into bite size pieces (halve the grape tomatoes). Cut the pepperonis into strips and the mozzarella into 1cm cubes. 3. Mix vegetables, cheese, pepperoni, and pasta. Add italian dressing when serving. Enjoy!

Preheat oven to 450 degrees F. Spread olive oil on the bottom of each pita and place on a metal pan.

Add pizza sauce and mozzarella cheese on top of each pita, to taste. Thiny slice tomato and add about 3 slices per pizza. Add fresh basil leaves between tomatoes to taste. 

Make a mixture of olive oil, minced minced garlic, and rosemary. Drizzle over pizza.

Bake for 10-12 minutes, until browned and crispy on bottom of pita. Optionally top with a drizzle of balsmic reduction and eat. Enjoy!

recipe: Spread cream cheese on bagel. Place smoked salmon slices and sliced green onions on top. Enjoy!

meal_name: premade broccoli cheddar soup and sourdough bread
recipe: Heat up broccoli cheddar soup in a pan. Bake sourdough bread in oven. Dip bread in soup. Enjoy!

meal_name: premade broccoli cheddar soup and sourdough bread
recipe: Heat up broccoli cheddar soup in a pan. Bake sourdough bread in oven. Dip bread in soup. Enjoy!

meal_name: costco chicken alfredo sauce with broccoli
recipe: Season broccoli with oil, salt, and pepper, and cook broccoli in oven at 400 degrees for about 10-12 minutes. Cook the alfredo sauce according to instructions on packaging. Enjoy!

meal_name: costco beef pot stickers with ramen noodles
recipe: Prepare pot stickers and ramen noodles according to instructions on packaging. Top with soy sauce, or your favorite stir fry topping sauce. Slice up green onions and top with these as well. Enjoy!

meal_name: Garlic Tomato Bagel with Cream Cheese
recipe: 1. Heat olive oil in a pan on medium high heat. Put grape tomatoes in pan with oil and saute for 5 minutes, until softened and lightly charred. Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute more. Toast bagel and spread both side with cream cheese. Place roasted garlic tomatoes and remaining olive oil from pan on top of the bagel. Enjoy!

meal_name: Bagel with Salami, Ham, and Sliced Cucumber
Bagel with Salami, Ham, and Sliced Cucumber

recipe:
Turn oven on to a low broil. Place ham, salami, and provolone cheese onto an open sub bun. Bake on a low broil for 2 minutes, until cheese is melted. 

Add banana peppers, cucumber slices, lettuce, and a drizzle of italian dressing. Enjoy!

1. Toss the cubed chicken breasts in flour that has been generously seasoned with salt and pepper, until all pieces are lightly coated.

2. With the cooker's lid off, heat oil on HIGH or brown, until sizzling. 

3. Place the ocated chicken in the cooker and saute until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.

4. Add the onion, carrots, bell pepper, and jalapeno pepper, and stir well, sauteing 1 additional minute. 5. Add the chicken stock, cilantro, cumin, salt, and pepper to the chicken mixture. Securely lock the pressure cooker's lid and set for 7 minutes on HIGH. 

6. Perform a quick release to release the cooker's pressure. Stir in corn kernels and tortilla strips before serving.

1. With your slow cooker's lid off, heat button on HIGH or brown, until melted and sizzling. 

2. Place onion in cooker and saute until translucent, 4-5 minutes. 

3. Add broccoli florets, caroots, chicken stock, garlic powder, and onion powder. Securely lock the pressure cooker's lid and set for 4 minutes on HIGH.

4. Perform a quick release to release the cooker's pressure. 

5. Stir in heavy cream and Cheddar cheese, and then add salt and pepper to taste before serving.

recipe: Heat up your favorite brand of canned tomato basil soup. Make a grilled cheese. Enjoy!

Cook rice by following instructions on bag. Cook frozen chicken tenders in the air fryer at 400 for 10 minutes (or follow instructions on bag, if available). Steam frozen mixed vegetables in microwave. Top with your favorite stir fry sauce.
Place slices of brie and raspberry jelly on bread. Butter both sides and cook in pan on medium heat until cheese is melted and both sides are golden brown.
Place slices of brie and raspberry jelly on bread. Butter both sides and cook in pan on medium heat until cheese is melted and both sides are golden brown.

Prepare rice. Prepare the batter at https://www.spendwithpennies.com/crispy-fried-dill-pickles/, leaving out the dill. 

Slice up cauliflower into bite sized pieces, and cover in batter, then panko bread crumbs. 

Place in air fryer at 400 degrees for 8 minutes, or until outside is golden brown and crispy.

Remove from air fryer and place in a container with a lid. Put your favorite stir fry sauce in the container and shake cauliflower and stir fry sauce together gently, until cauliflower is covered. 

Heat up mixed vegetables in the microwave. Serve vegetables and coated cauliflower over rice. Enjoy!

Preheat open to 450 degrees F. Slice bagel in half, and spread a drizzle of pizza sauce on each side. Put mozzarella cheese and pepperonis on top of pizza sauce. Bake for 5 minutes at 450 degrees F. Enjoy!

1. Combine .25 cup kosher salt, 1 Tbsp black pepper, .75 tsp garlic powder, .75 tsp onion powder, .75 tsp oregano, and 1/8 tsp red pepper flakes to make grill seasoning. 


2.Prepare the lemon butter sauce: 
(For 4 servings, cut in half for 1). Add 1 Tbsp butter, 2 Tbsp finely chopped yellow onion, and 1 tsp minced garlic to a skillet. Saute for about 3 minutes, then add 1/3 cup white wine and 3 Tbsp lemon joice. Boil until the liquid is reduced to about 1/4 cup - 3-5 minutes. 


3. Preheat oven to 425 and throw in green beans with salt, pepper, oil. 


4.  Prepare the grill baste: (for 4 servings amount). Combine 2 Tbsp butter and 1/2 cup finely chopped yellow onion, and saute about 2-3 minutes. Add 1 tsp garlic, and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add 1 Tbsp flour and brown for 2 minutes. Whisk in 1/4 cup red wine vinegar (or red wine), 2 Tbsp lemon juice, and 1 Tbsp Dijon mustard, 1.5 Tbsp sugar, and .5 Tbsp parsley. Cook for 5 minutes on medium low, whisking intermittently. 


.5. Butterfly chicken breasts. Season with grill seasoning, brush with grill baste, and put on grill or pan. Cook for about 5 minutes on each side, adding grill baste once in middle. In last minute, top each chicken with goat cheese, and top with lemon butter sauce.

Prepare noodles. Shred and cook ground beef in a pan on medium high heat. Drain the fat, and add spaghetti sauce to pan with beef. Cook on a low simmer for a few minutes, then serve meat sauce over noodles. Add parmesan to taste.

meal_name: cheddar brats and peas and carrots
recipe: heat up brats according to package instructions. For peas and carrots - bake carrots at 425 for 15 minutes with oil, salt and pepper. Boil peas. Then combine, and add 1 Tbsp butter or margarine and about 2 tsp honey, + salt and pepper. Enjoy!

notes: saute the cherry tomatoes early, add pasta sauce, and leave out the almonds

meal_name: sun-dried tomato and basil spaghetti w/ Chicken
notes: saute the cherry tomatoes early, add pasta sauce, and leave out the almonds

recipe: marinade tofu in the marinade at: https://aaronandclaire.com/4-ways-to-enjoy-rice-paper-recipe/, or your favorite alternative sauce. Then cover in corn starch and salt, and fry in oil. Serve in spring rolls, with fresh veggies.

meal_name: Date Night Burgers and hash browns
recipe:
1. Heat a generous amount of oil in a pan on high heat. Place shredded hash browns in the oil and cook until golden brown, about 10 minutes. 2. Form ground chuck into burger shapes, season with salt and pepper to taste, and place on a pan on medium heat. Cook to taste, about 4-5 minutes per side recommended.

3. Slice up poblano peppers into long strips. Heat a drizzle of oil on medium high heat in a pan, and add the pepper slices. Cook until slightly charred, about 5 minutes.

4. De-seed dates and add into blender with 2 Tbsp water. Blend, and continue to add water 1 tsp at a time and blend until a thick but spreadable paste is formed. 
. 5. Toast burger buns. Once toasted, spread about 1.5 Tbsp Date Spread and 3 Tbsp goat cheese on each bun. Place 4-5 poblano slices on top of the goat cheese on each. Place burger on bun. Server with hash browns and enjoy!

meal_name: Brown sugar bourbon apple pork chops
Yellow Coconut Curry with Chickpeas and rice
recipe: Prepare rice. Heat a drizzle of oil in a pan on medium high heat. Drain a can of chickpeas, and add to pain with oil, cooking until lightly browned (about 3-5 minutes). Add a can of Lai's Thai coconut curry, found here: https://www.yaisthai.com/products/thai-coconut-curry-yellow to the same pan, and simmar for a few minutes. Serve chickpea curry over rice. Enjoy!

meal_name: Sweet Corn and Poblano Chowder with Old Bay Toast
Honey Miso Broccoli and Sweet Potato Donburi

recipe: Prepare rice. Cube chicken breasts. Pan fry until edges are browned. Add Patak's sauce to pan with chicken. Place lid on and simmer on medium-low heat for 6-7 minutes. Serve completed sauce over rice.

Prepare rice. Cube chicken breasts. Pan fry until edges are browned. Add Patak's sauce to pan with chicken. Place lid on and simmer on medium-low heat for 6-7 minutes. Serve completed sauce over rice.

 For naan bread follow the link here: https://glutenfreeonashoestring.com/naan-bread/

1. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add garlic and cook about 3 minutes. Add chicken, basil, salt, and crushed red pepper. Cook, stirring often, until chicken is cooked (10-15 mins).

 2.Cook pasta according to package directions.

 3. While pasta is cooking, mince the tomatoes. Add tomatoes, broth, and wine to chicken. Reduce heat to medium low and simmer about 5 minutes, or until starts to thicken. Stir in whipping cream and cheese and simmer for 2 minutes more.

 4. Place drained pasta in pan with chicken. Mix and serve, with additional parmesan cheese as desired. Enjoy!

meal_name: Pork Sausage and Bell Pepper Risotto
Sweet, Sticky, and Spicy Chicken stir fry

recipe:
1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Lightly grease a medium baking sheet.

2. Pour egg into a small shallow bowl. Place bread crumbs in a separate shallow bowl. Butterfly chicken breasts, then dip chicken into egg, then into the bread crumbs. Place coated chicken on the prepared baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until not longer pink and juices run clear.

3. Prepare pasta of your choice.

4.. Pour .5 of the spaghetti sauce into a 7 x 11 inch baking dish. Place chicken over sauce, and cover with remaining sauce. Sprinkle mozzarella and parmesan cheeses on top and return to the preheated oven for 20 minutes. Serve over pasta and enjoy!

1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. 2. Prepare pasta of your choice.

3. Pour half of the spaghetti sauce into a 7 x 11 inch baking dish. Place chicken tenders or chicken patties over sauce, and cover with remaining sauce. Sprinkle mozzarella and parmesan cheeses on top and bake for 20 minutes. Serve over pasta and enjoy!

Start spaghetti. Season chicken with italian seasoning, salt, and pepper and cook in a pan until cooked through.

 Cut grape tomatoes into halves and cook in olive oil with scallion whites and garlic for ~3-4 minutes.

 Meanwhile, combine cream cheese, parmesan, butter, and milk (start with .75 cup and progress to 1 cup of milk as needed) in a pan, whisking until combined and then simmering until thickened. Add Mrs. Dash Garlic and Herb Seasoning, to taste. Add pepper and salt to taste. 

Combine alfredo sauce with tomatoes and chciken ,and serve over pasta. Top with green onion greens. Enjoy!

meal_name: Nutmeg and Thyme Chicken Thighs with Carrots and Potatoes

recipe: 1. Prepare meatballs according to the recipe here: https://www.bettycrocker.com/recipes/classic-meatballs/2959910f-1b27-438a-9085-d40b1950db20. Cook egg noodles. Heat up cream of mushroom soup and serve with meatballs over noodles. Enjoy!

1. Cook pasta. Cook bacon and put to side.

 Cut up red onion and combine 1/4 of the red onion, half the minced garlic, red pepper flakes, and 2 Tbsp olive oil in a pan. Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper, and cook on medium heat. Remove from heat and put to side when complete.

 3.After the chicken is removed, add green onion whites and remaining 1/4 of red onion. Cook on medium heat for 1-2 minutes. Reduce heat. Then add heavy cream and milk, starting with just 75% of the milk and increasing to 100% as needed. Add asiago cheese and simmer until somewhat thickened (2-3 minutes).

 4.Put chicken back in and simmer for another 1-2 minutes. Add a pinch of salt (1/4 tsp for 2 people) as needed. Take off heat, top with green onion greens and bacon, and serve with optional parmesan

meal_name: Gnocchi with Burst Tomatoes and Mozzarella
recipe:
1. Heat the broiler with a rack about 6 inches from the heat source. 

2. In a large *12 inch) skillet on the stovertop heat enough olive oil to lightly coat the bottom of the pan (about 1 Tablespoon) over medium high. Add half the gnocchi to the pan, breaking up any that are stuck together. Cover with a lid or baking sheet and cook, undisturbed, until golden brown on one side, 2 to 4 minutes. Transfer to a medium bowl. Repeat with the remaining gnocchi and olive oil. 

3. Add the butter to the skillet and cook over medium-high, stirrin goften, util golden-brown and tasty, 1-2 minutes. Add the gralic, red pepper flakes, 1.5tsp salt, and a few grinds of pepper, reducing the heat slightly if nececssary to avoid scorching. Add the tomatoes and 3 Tbsp water and cook, shaking hte pan occcasionally, until the tomatoes have softened and the liquid has slightly thickened, 4-6 minutes. Smash the tomatoes as they burst to help them along. 

4. Add the seared gnocchi and .25 cup basil (if using). Stir to coat, then shake into an even layer. Top with mozzarella, cut or torn into .5 inch pieces, and drizzle lightly with olive oil. Broil until the cheese is melted and browned in spots, 2-4 minutes. Top with more basil, red pepper flakes, and black pepper if desired.
Preheat oven to 425. Poke holes in the potates, rub with olive oil and salt, and bake 45-60 minutes. Fluff and serve with toppings.
